title: Help! Someone stole my account and changed the password and email but I'm still logged in on chrome!
body: I have no idea what to do and am scared to logout because I will not be able to get back in. Any help would be great!

replies.body:
Not to fear, we're here to help! If you write a support ticket in using [this form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), we'll be able to assist you in recovering your account. Please provide *as much detail as possible* so we can resolve this quicker!

Let me know if you have any questions.
